content:
About This Page

This is a basic HTML page with some styling applied through CSS. It demonstrates various HTML elements and how they can be styled.

This is a highlighted section that stands out from the rest of the content.

Features Demonstrated

  • HTML document structure
  • Header and paragraph text
  • Styled headings (h1, h2)
  • Custom CSS classes
  • Color and spacing adjustments

Did You Know?

When you click "Edit" to chance the text in this section, the input box will take raw HTML code and any css styling which can be used to make things look pretty. I think it will even take Javascript. Basically, ask chat GPT to write you some HTML and css with your text, and copy it here.

2025 the Lotus seed
